function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient dosing due to ambiguous guidelines for UV fixture deployment","Impact":"Increased risk of incomplete air treatment and potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Provide clear and specific dosing guidelines for different architectural features and spaces","Technologies":"Visual TM computer-assisted lighting program for accurate UV fluency rate estimation","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially those with very distinctive architectural features","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and UV fixture manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate air changes per minute in the upper room","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UV treatment and greater risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure a minimum of 25 vertical air changes per minute in the upper room","Technologies":"Ceiling fans and other air circulation systems","People":"Occupants of buildings with upper rooms","Owner":"Building maintenance and facility management"},{"Description":"Far UV dosing not confined to the upper room","Impact":"Potential safety concerns for occupants due to unconfined Far UV dosing","Mitigation":"Develop clear guidelines for safe and effective Far UV dosing in various spaces","Technologies":"UV dosing technology for controlled and targeted application","People":"Occupants of buildings with Far UV dosing","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and UV fixture manufacturers"}]}
